document.masterDocTitle: First checklist of pyraloid moths (Lepidoptera: Pyraloidea) in Croatia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: First checklist of pyraloid moths (Lepidoptera: Pyraloidea) in Croatia

subSubSection.paragraph:
Syn.

(S.V.); Mann 1857 (M), Mann 1867 a (P), Mann 1869 (M)

Syn.

;
Abafi-Aigner et al. 1896
(P), Rebel 1904 (K, M), Schawerda 1921 (M),
Gottstein Matočec et al. 2002
(M)

Syn.

; Rebel 1919 (M), Klimesch 1942 (M), Neustetter 1956 (M)

Syn.

; Wocke 1871 (M),
Abafi-Aigner et al. 1896
(P), Rebel 1904 (K, M), Rebel 1913 (M), Rebel 1914 (M), Schawerda 1920 (M), Schawerda 1921 (M), Coll. Igalffy (K), Coll. Koča (K)

*
Eudonia mercurella (Linnaeus, 1758)
; Carnelutti 1994 (M), Coll. Kučinić (M), Habeler 2003 (M),

Syn.

; Rebel 1891 (M),
Abafi-Aigner et al. 1896
(M), Rebel 1913 (M), Schawerda 1921 (M), Klimesch 1942 (M), Neustetter 1956 (M), Coll. Koča (K)

Syn.
Scoparia truncicolella (Stt.)
; Coll. Igalffy (K), Coll. Koča (K)
* Heliothela wulfeniana (Scopoli, 1763) ; Mann 1857 (M), Mann 1867 a (P), Rebel 1911 (M), Prohaska 1922 (M)

*

; Staudinger 1879 (M), Rebel 1904 (K, M), Rebel 1913 (M), Carnelutti 1994 (M), Coll. Koča (K)

*

; Rebel 1914 (M), Schawerda 1916 (M), Schawerda 1921 (M), Prohaska 1922 (M), Habeler 2003 (M), Koren 2015 (M), Coll. Gumhalter (M)

*

; Wocke 1871 (M), Rebel 1895 (P),
Abafi-Aigner et al. 1896
(P), Rebel 1904 (K, M), Rebel 1910 (M), Schawerda 1921 (M), Carnelutti 1994 (M), Coll. Koča (K) Syn.

; Mann 1867 a (P), Mann 1869 (M)

*

*

*

; Habeler 2003 (M), Koren 2015 (M), Koren 2018 (K)
